channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain is blocked again!, 3rd September
item.description:
On the corner of portland street outside of the cotswold inn the flooding is almost to my frontage and at risk of flooding my cellar bar. My customers are also getting soaked by the buses that come past regularly and plow through the huge puddle. I have to report this issue every year and every time I am told these drains are clearly regularly however I know for a fact that they are not as I live on site and and here every day and they are ALWAYS blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Portland Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate drainage leads to driveway flooding, 3rd September
item.description:
We live in number 30. When it is heavy rain there is no drains between our property and the corner of the green on Barnmeadow Road. Our driveway is the lowest point and we are consistently getting flooded. It has almost come in to the house twice if not for us manually removing water with buckets and opening the drains. The water has go past our property to hit two drains so if it is heavy rain we are flooded. This is a huge risk - luckily I have been working from home the last few times but if it happens while I am out our house will flood. This has been happening for a few years now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnmeadow Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 3rd September

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No drainage, 3rd September
item.description:
This manhole has constantly issues. Last year I was told it’s not blocked, but clearly it is. Throughout these past months we kept the area around it tidy, free of leaves/mud/anything else, but still this is an issue. Please come and fix this otherwise next time we’ll see water coming inside. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vineyard Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Lampost bulb needs replacing Queens Rd., 3rd September
item.description:
It's on the bridge above the Honeybourne walk by the Station on the corner of Queens rd and Kensington Ave Absolutey pitch black at night. As it's on the bridge you may have a problem changing bulb unless you use a cherry picker and access it from Kensington Avenue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken drain surround - creating a pothole., 3rd September
item.description:
There is a broken drain surround, creating a pothole. This is eastbound on the main road of Cold Pool Lane, just before the Hatherley mini roundabout, just past the new housing estate on Symphony Road, Hatherley. Could the drain surround be repaired please ? It's been broken for quite a while now. Thankyou !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Flag attached to bus shelter, 3rd September
item.description:
When leaving Wentworth Court, turning left, along Village Road there is a large flag attached to the bus shelter which causes a visual distraction for drivers. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
